docs.text:
Social Authentication


Base URL: 
https://www.staging.artofvisuals.com/api/aov-web/auth


URL
 - 
/social


Accepted Methods

- POST - JSON


Accepted Data


{
   "access_token": "",  // A token granted by the FB SDK on the frontend
   "provider": "facebook"  // Other providers will be added later
}




In the above, 
access_token
 is a token received from Facebook's API, generally attained using their

Facebook Login integration.


Response


A 200 status code with a response object.


   {
       "token": ""  // Internal token
   }




Errors


409
 User already exists and requires login

400
 Bad request data
